content: a simple little seamless or almost seamless cardigan designed to fit gorgeous little 16 inch tall waldorf style doll the cardigan is knit from the top down and features raglan sleeve shaping and built in button bands for three sweet buttons to encourage fine motor skill development two options for knitting the sleeves are detailed they can be knit either as small circular pieces or flat and seamed later this little cardigan also fits baby dolls of the baby born size
